actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Wheat, Soybeans, and Feed Grains.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Wheat, Soybeans, and Feed Grains

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to require marketing loans or production option payments for soybeans.
short_title: Soybean Production Program Improvement Act of 1986

summary.text: Soybean Production Program Improvement Act of 1986 - Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to set soybean price supports for the 1988 through 1990 crops at $5.02 per bushel. (Repeals the current price support provision for such crop years.) Directs the Secretary of Agriculture, for each of the 1986 through 1990 soybean crops, to permit a producer who agrees to forgo loan eligibility or to repay nonrecourse loan at full face value to obtain specified amounts of commodity marketing certificates.

titles.title: Soybean Production Program Improvement Act of 1986
A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to require marketing loans or production option payments for soybeans.
